name: PRAYorPREY
description:
You play the Monk! your disciples have been kidnapped by Aliens who have Invaded  earth. The monk steps up to save his students but the only challenge is his movement and attack as a limit and the monk as to try and save the students before the move limit runs out. Will you be able help the Monk on his mission? Good Luck!  

Controls

The game can be played using a Keyboard or a Controller 

Move - W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys (Keyboard) &  Analog Stick (Controller)

Attack - K key (Keyboard) & X (PlayStation) , B (Xbox), A (Nintendo)

Dont forget You are their Only Hope!
